text:
Since we were child people always had ask us « What do you want to do in the future ? Who do you want to be? » but what if we don’t know ?. I was interested in a lot of things but none of them enough to do it my entire life. I grew up without knowing what will be my future life but it never disturb me that much. But, one day, you have to make a choice and that’s where it start. I asked questions, opened books and go to different places to be helped but I never been convinced.
   In addition, my parents were worried for me and it make me feel bad too. Furthermore, I had plenty of moment to talk to my older brother who had to live the same thing as me and it helped me hardly. He talked to me about his courses and what was it. He said that he was doing mathematics, informatics and of course English and I was enchanted. I love every single thing he was talking about. He said that our dad was doing a job similar to what he was studying for. I never even realized it. So that is what is about my task, my brother and my father. These two helped me more than they think. They are in informatics and that what I am studying for right now too. They talked about it with such a lot of passion that it had me too. They are both passionate and I love to talk with them about this subject. We can say that my source of inspiration was right next to me without me knowing. What can I say more ? My dad is currently making class in an engineering school, it’s very new for him since he was just a engineer until this year. Proving that we can still evolve. My brother graduate this year and now he is creating an enterprise with a friend.
  To conclude, the research of my future was a little bit chaotic but thanks to my dad and my brother   I find something were I’m good at and that I love.
Thank you for reading,
Alex Dupont.
